net.ddns.taytom258.SpigotRealClockPlugin.logger

Class LogHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.ddns.taytom258.SpigotRealClockPlugin.logger.LogHandler

  • public class LogHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Loghandler for printing errors and messages to server console. Automatically adds plugin name, as stated in plugin.yml, to all messages.
    Author:
    taytom258
    See Also:
    JavaPlugin.getLogger()

      • severe

        public static void severe(java.lang.String error,
                          boolean disable,
                          java.lang.Exception e)
        Send severe message, with exception information, to the console Also gives option to disable plugin.
        Parameters:
        error - string, message to send
        disable - boolean, should plugin be disabled after message is sent
        e - exception, exception thrown
        See Also:
        Exception, Throwable.getCause(), Object.getClass(), Server.getPluginManager()

      • severe

        public static void severe(java.lang.String error,
                          boolean disable)
        Send warning message to console with option to disable plugin
        Parameters:
        error - string, message to send
        disable - boolean, should plugin be disabled after message is sent
        See Also:
        Server.getPluginManager()
